3.11.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where some of ai metrics was missed in analytics

If any [AI Gateway plugin](/plugins/?category=ai) has been enabled in a self-managed Kong Gateway deployment for more than a week, upgrades from 3.10 versions to 3.11.0.0 will fail due to a license migration issue. This does not affect Konnect deployments.

A fix will be provided in 3.11.0.1.

See [breaking changes in 3.11](/gateway/breaking-changes/#known-issues-in-3-11-0-0) for a temporary workaround.

3.10.0.0.message: Added support for boto3 SDKs for Bedrock provider, and for Google GenAI SDKs for Gemini provider.

3.9.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where the *ai-prompt-guard* plugin could fail when handling requests with multiple models.

3.8.0.0.message: allow AI plugin to read request from buffered file
add `match_all_roles` option to allow match all roles in addition to `user`.
Fixed an issue when `allow_all_conversation_history` is set to false, the first user request is selected instead of the last one.

3.7.0.message: Increased the maximum length of regex expressions to 500 for the allow and deny parameters.

3.7.0.0.message: Improve error handling in AI plugins.

3.6.0.0.message: Introduced the new **AI Prompt Guard** which can allow and/or block  LLM requests based on pattern matching.
